PropertyList.text:
__________________Engine Start___________________ 1. Propeller pitch FINE (N). 2. Mixture rich. 3. Magnetos BOTH. 4. Start one engine at a time.
____________________Take Off_____________________ 1. Flaps 1/4 2. Propeller pitch FINE (N). 3. Take care to make the take off run straight. 4. Minimum getting off speed 78 mph.
____________________Landing______________________ 1. Flaps 1/4 - full as required 2. Propeller pitch FINE (N). 3. Approach speed 115 mph.
____________________Real data____________________ Maximum speed : 174 kt (200 mph) Cruise speed : 143 kt (165 mph) Stall speed (no flaps) : 63 kt (73 mph) Approach speed : 100 kt (115 mph) Minimum getting off speed: 68 kt (78 mph)
C.G. Range (aft of hull datum point; Assumed to be 7.75m behind the nose) Maximum Forward 55.5 in (360.62 in) Maximum Aft 66.8 in (371.92 in)
Maximum weight: 40 500 lb (45 000 lb for the long range Mark III 'boats)
__________________Engine Limits__________________ Maximum RPM Boost. Cylinder temp. Oil temp.deg.C. Take off 2475 +4 1/4 235 for 15 min. 90 Climbing 2250 +2 1/2 235 80 Cruising 2250 +2 190 70 All out 2600 +2 235 90 Oil pressure maximum 80 lb./sq. in. 5 minutes minimum 5 lb./sq. in.
